content: baymax pattern character belongs to disney this is just fanart i used chenille yarn and an 8mm hook you will need to adjust the eye size depending on your yarn size my baymax turned out to be 30cm tall head 1 magic_ring 8sc 8 2 increase x 8 16 3 single_crochet increase x 8 24 4 2sc increase x 8 32 5 row 5-10 single_crochet all around 32 11 2sc decrease x 8 24 12 single_crochet decrease x 8 16 13 decrease x 8 8 insert 15mm safety eyes between st 8 and 9 4 single_crochet apart and embroider black thread into the eye stitches legs make 2 cut and fasten_off for leg 1 hold the yarn for leg 2 and connect to leg 1 1 magic_ring 6sc 6 2 increase x 6 12 3 2sc increase x 4 16 4 blo single_crochet all around 16 5 row 5-10 single_crochet all around 16 do not cut the yarn for leg 2 continue to row 11 and connect to leg 1 1 11 single_crochet both legs together 32 12 increase 7sc x 4 36 13 single_crochet all around 36 14 increase 5sc x 6 42 15 row 15-19 single_crochet all around 42 20 increase 6sc x 6 48 21 row 21-23 single_crochet all round 48 24 decrease 6sc x 6 42 25 single_crochet all around 42 26 decrease 5sc x 6 36 27 single_crochet all around 36 28 decrease 4sc x 6 30 29 single_crochet all around 30 30 decrease 3sc x 6 24 31 single_crochet all around 24 32 decrease 2sc x 6 18 33 single_crochet all around 18 34 decrease single_crochet x 6 12 35 decrease single_crochet x 4 8 arms make 2 1 magic_ring 6sc 6 2 increase single_crochet x 3 9 3 row 3-17 single_crochet all around 9 stuff only about 75% of the arm hold the arms flat and 4sc across 2 lollipop make 2 circles proportionate to your baymax i used cotton yarn 4mm hook for the lollipop and lace yarn 1 5mm hook for the stick 6sc all over until you re happy with the length happy making do tag me at @octoberin_thechair on ig if you make this as i ll love to see your version would also appreciate if you don t sell this free pattern as it is terribly unethical 3
